resources.string:
Privacy Policy

Last updated: May 28, 2024

1. Introduction

Welcome to Hi Beauty. Your privacy is very important to us. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you use our application.

2. Information We Collect

We collect various types of information to provide and improve our services to you, including:

  • Personal Information: Name, email address, and other information you provide voluntarily.
  • Usage Information: Data on how you interact with our application, including IP address, device type, operating system, and usage activity.
  • Access Information: Camera data, gallery, and precise geographic location if you grant permission through your device settings.

3. Use of Information

The information we collect is used for various purposes, including:

  • Providing and maintaining the application services.
  • Improving and personalizing the user experience.
  • Managing your account and providing customer support.
  • Sending updates, promotions, and other relevant information.
  • Analyzing application usage to enhance our services.

4. Sharing Information

We will not share your personal information with third parties except in the following circumstances:

  • With your consent.
  • To comply with legal obligations or protect our rights and interests.
  • With third-party service providers who assist us in operating the application, provided they maintain the confidentiality of your information.
  • In connection with mergers, acquisitions, or sales of assets, provided that the third parties agree to adhere to this privacy policy.

5. Information Security

We take reasonable security measures to protect your information from unauthorized access, use, or disclosure. However, no method of data transmission over the internet or electronic storage is 100% secure, so we cannot guarantee absolute security.

6. User Rights

You have the right to:

  • Access, update, or delete your personal information that we hold.
  • Withdraw consent you have previously given regarding the use of your personal information.
  • File a complaint with the relevant data protection authority if you believe your privacy rights have been violated.

7. Changes to the Privacy Policy

We may update this privacy policy from time to time. Any changes will be notified through the application or other appropriate means before they take effect. You are encouraged to review this privacy policy periodically.

8. Contact Us

If you have any questions or concerns about this privacy policy, please feel free to contact us at:

Email: redy.wijaya24@gmail.com

Email: farhannn58@gmail.com
